SkewStudent class documentation¶

class SkewStudent.SkewStudent(nup=10.0, lam=-0.1)¶

Skewed Student distribution class.

Methods

cdf(arg) Cumulative density function (CDF).
icdf(arg) Inverse cumulative density function.
pdf(arg) Probability density function (PDF).
plot_cdf((arg=array([-2.        , ...) Plot cumulative density function.
plot_icdf((arg=array([-0.99, -0.97, -0.95, ...) Plot inverse cumulative density function.
plot_pdf((arg=array([-2.        , ...) Plot probability density function.
plot_rvspdf((arg=array([-2.        , ...) Plot kernel density estimate of a random sample.
rvs([size]) Random variates with mean zero and unit variance.
cdf(arg)¶

Cumulative density function (CDF).

Parameters:

arg : array

Grid of point to evaluate CDF at
Returns:

cdf : array

CDF values. Same shape as the input.
icdf(arg)¶

Inverse cumulative density function.

Parameters:

arg : array

Grid of point to evaluate ICDF at. Must belong to (0, 1)
Returns:

icdf : array

ICDF values. Same shape as the input.
pdf(arg)¶

Probability density function (PDF).

Parameters:

arg : array

Grid of point to evaluate PDF at
Returns:

pdf : array

PDF values. Same shape as the input.
rvs(size=1)¶

Random variates with mean zero and unit variance.

Parameters:

size : int or tuple

Size of output array
Returns:

rvs : array

Array of random variates
